price: 92. (Mûssa) alobi: Oh Hânına!(1) Eloko nini epekisaki yo mpo opekisa bango tango omonaki bazali kobunga nzela?
arabic: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ
footnotes: 1 Hânına: Bótala suratu Al-Baqarah: 248, An-Nisá: 163, Al-An’âm: 84, Al-A’râf: 122,142.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā manaʿaka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū
